article.title: Saudi Arabia Purchases Rockwell Collins Receiver-Transmitters
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $14,495,712 contract Â to exercise an option for 168 RT-1851A(C)/ARC receiver-transmitters (including royalty fees) for the government of Saudi Arabia under the Foreign Military Sales program. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
